item.title: How to port-forward from EC2 instances without the need for opening any SSH ports or creating Bastion hosts
item.description: Learn how to port-forward from EC2 instances in private subnets without opening SSH ports or setting up bastion hosts. This AWS SSM Session Manager guide provides a secure, cost-effective, and simple solution for EC2 access and port forwarding.
